title: Cloud Development Team Lead
details: Joined as a .NET Developer, directly contributing to the ‘Glasswall Rebuild for Email’ SaaS solution in an agile development team.
Contributed as a developer in a high performing scrum team.
Became the scrum master and team lead, responsible for a scrum team within the wider development team.
Gained certifications as a scrum master and CKAD (Certified Kubernetes Application Developer)

title: Junior Developer
details: Created MVC websites using the Microsoft .Net framework.
Built responsive web pages using the Bootstrap 4 framework.
Built apps using jQuery and Vue.js.
Worked on a fluid-dynamic selection engine written in C#.

title: Summer Project
details: Developed website prototype for revamping customer enquiry forms.
Developed a script using the natural language toolkit to analyse and consolidate forms from before the update.
Worked with BT using sensitive data (protected under NDA).
Provided analysis and translation of colloquial engineering vocabulary to improve customer experience.

title: Final Year Project
details: My final year project is a web app, acting as a student dashboard and study planner.The plan was to solve a problem observed from my own experience of being a student (unable to track my grade and progress without an excel spreadsheet).
Web Scraping tool to retrieve information on assignments.
Client-side scripts written in JavaScript and PHP.
MySQL and Java for the backend.
The SQL database is stored and accessed through an Amazon AWS endpoint, using their relational database service.
